main.bio: Iâ€™m a product designer based in Bangalore, India. I have 2+ years of experience in IT industry. I have worked for some outgoing companies previously. testimonials.text: A dream is not that which you see while sleeping, it is something that does not let you sleep.
If You Are Working On Something That You Really Care About, You Donâ€™t Have To Be Pushed. The Vision Pulls You.
All of us do not have equal talent. But, all of us have an equal opportunity to develop our talents.
Fake It Until You Make It! Act As If You Had All The Confidence You Require Until It Becomes Your Reality.
